DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate absorption lutein consume different oil blend .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study meet follow inclusion criterion : BMI ≥ 18 ≤ 25 kg/m2 Between 18 45 year age , inclusive Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female , nulliparous least 6 week postpartum prior screen visit . A urine pregnancy test require female subject unless childbearing potential . If female childbearing potential , practice one follow method birth control ( continue duration study ) : Condoms , sponge , diaphragm intrauterine device ; Oral parenteral contraceptive 3 month prior screen visit ; Vasectomized partner ; Total abstinence sexual intercourse . If chronic medication , subject constant dosage least two month prior screen visit Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : Current smoker Current chronic disease , include malabsorption gastrointestinal disorder ; hyperlipidemia ; anemia ; hemophilia ; excessive bleeding ; cystic fibrosis ; kidney disease requiring dialysis ; diabetes ; active malignancy ; waste condition Current chronic contagious , infectious disease , active tuberculosis , Hepatitis B C , HIV Vegetarian , selective food habits/dieting Average intake alcoholic beverage great 2 drink per day Medication dietary supplement use low plasma lipid affect lipid absorption transport , include antibiotic Supplement use contains carotenoid ( multivitamin example ) Known allergy intolerance ingredient find study product
